com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class ResourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.ResourceController

  • public class ResourceController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to Resource
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute> resourceAttributeList
      An ArrayList of ResourceAttribute used to display all the existing ResourceAttribute(s) stored in the database.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues> resourceAttributeValueList
      An ArrayList of ResAttrValues used to display all the existing ResAttrValues(s) stored in the database.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource> resourceList
      An ArrayList of Resource used to display all the existing Resources stored in the database.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource selectedResource
      An instance of Resource used to store the Resource selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute selectedResourceAttributes
      An instance of ResourceAttribute used to store the ResourceAttribute selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues selectedResourceAttributeValue
      An instance of ResAttrValues used to store the ResAttrValues selected by the user from the user interface.

      ResourceController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResource()
      Opens the /System Learning/Resource/Add/AddResource.xhtml page for creating a new Resource instance.
      void addResourceAttribute()
      Opens the /System Learning/Resource/Add/AddResourceAttributeDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new instance of @{code ResourceAttribute} corresponding to an existing Resource instance.
      void addResourceAttributeValue()
      Opens the /System Learning/Resource/Add/AddResourceAttributeValueDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new ResAttrValues instance corresponding to a @{code ResourceAttribute} of a Resource instance.
      void cancelAddResourceAttribute()
      Cancels the operation of adding an existing ResourceAttribute instance corresponding to an existing Resource instance.
      void cancelAddResourceAttributeValue()
      Cancels the operation of adding a new ResAttrValues corresponding to an existing ResourceAttribute instance
      void cancelUpdateResource()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing Resource instance.
      void cancelUpdateResourceAttribute()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing ResourceAttribute instance.
      void cancelUpdateResourceAttributeValue()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing ResAttrValues instance.
      void deleteResource()
      Deletes the instance of Resource stored in selectedResource property
      void deleteResourceAttribute()
      Deletes an instance of ResourceAttribute stored in selectedResourceAttributes property
      void deleteResourceAttributeValue()
      Deletes the instance of ResAttrValues stored in selectedResourceAttributeValue property
      ResourceDAO getDaoResource()
      Returns the value of daoResource property
      ResourceAttributeDAO getDaoResourceAttribute()
      Returns the value of daoResourceAttribute property
      ResAttrValuesDAO getDaoResourceAttributeValue()
      Returns the value of daoResourceAttributeValue property
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDataTypeList()
      Returns the value of dataTypeList property
      java.lang.String getNewAttributeName()
      Returns the value of newAttributeName property
      java.lang.String getNewAttributeValue()
      Returns the value of newAttributeValue property
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute> getResourceAttributeList()
      Returns the value of ResourceAttributeList property corresponding to the selectedResource
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues> getResourceAttributeValueList()
      Returns the value of ResourceAttributeValueList property
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource> getResourceList()
      Returns the ArrayList of Resource instances available.
      java.lang.String getSelectedDataType()
      Returns the value of selectedDataType property
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource getSelectedResource()
      Returns the value of selectedResource property
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute getSelectedResourceAttributes()
      Returns the value of selectedResourceAttributes property
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues getSelectedResourceAttributeValue()
      Returns the value of selectedResourceAttributeValue property
      boolean isAttrbtn()
      Returns FALSE if an instance of the Resource is selected by the user otherwise TRUE.
      boolean isAttrValuebtn()
      Returns FALSE if an instance of ResourceAttribute is selected by the user otherwise TRUE.
      boolean isOperationFail()
      Returns FALSE if a Save button was pressed otherwise TRUE.
      void onResourceAttributeUnSelect()
      Disables the button for adding ResAttrValues instance corresponding to an existing ResourceAttribute instance.
      void onResourceSelect()
      Disables the button for adding ResAttrValues instance and enables the button for adding ResourceAttribute instance whenever an Resource instance is selected.
      void onResourceUnSelect()
      Disables the buttons for adding ResourceAttribute and ResAttrValues instances corresponding to an existing Resource instance.
      void saveAddResourceAttribute()
      Saves the newly added instance of ResourceAttributein the database corresponding to an existing Resource instance referred by selectedResource
      void saveAddResourceAttributeValue()
      Saves the newly added instance of ResAttrValuesin the database corresponding to an existing ResourceAttribute instance referred by selectedResourceAttributes
      void saveUpdateResource()
      Saves the updated value of selectedResource property in the database.
      void saveUpdateResourceAttribute()
      Saves the updated value of selectedResourceAttributes property in the database.
      void saveUpdateResourceAttributeValue()
      Saves the updated value of selectedResourceAttributeValue property in the database.
      void setAttrbtn(boolean attrbtn)
      Sets the attrbtn property to boolean argument.
      void setAttrValuebtn(boolean attrvaluebtn)
      Sets the attrValuebtn property to boolean argument.
      void setDaoResource(ResourceDAO daoResource)
      Sets the daoResource property to ResourceDAO argument.
      void setDaoResourceAttribute(ResourceAttributeDAO daoResourceAttribute)
      Sets the daoResourceAttribute property to ResourceAttributeDAO argument.
      void setDaoResourceAttributeValue(ResAttrValuesDAO daoResourceAttributeValue)
      Sets the daoResourceAttributeValue property to ResAttrValuesDAO argument.

      Sets the dataTypeList property to List argument

      Sets the newAttributeName property to String argument.

      Sets the newAttributeValue property to String argument.
      void setOperationFail(boolean operationFail)
      Sets the operationFail property to boolean argument.

      Sets the ResourceAttributeList property to ResourceAttribute argument.
      void setResourceAttributeValueList(java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues> resourceAttributeValueList)
      Sets the ResourceAttributeValueList property to ResAttrValues argument.
      void setResourceList(java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource> resourceList)
      Sets the ResourceList property to Resource argument.
      void setSelectedDataType(java.lang.String selectedDataType)
      Sets the selectedDataType property to String argument
      void setSelectedResource(com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource selectedResource)
      Sets the selectedResource property to Resource argument.

      Sets the selectedResourceAttributes property to ResourceAttribute argument.
      void setSelectedResourceAttributeValue(com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues selectedResourceAttributeValue)
      Sets the selectedResourceAttributeValue property to ResAttrValues argument.
      void showAddMessage()
      Displays a message inside a Primefaces growl component in case of successful add operation.
      void showUpdateMessage()
      Displays a message inside a Primefaces growl component in case of successful update operation.
      void updateResource()
      Opens the /System Learning/Resource/Update/UpdateResourceDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating the name and description of an existing Resource instance.
      void updateResourceAttribute()
      Opens the /System Learning/Resource/Update/UpdateResourceAttributeDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating the existing ResourceAttribute of an Resource instance.
      void updateResourceAttributeValue()
      Opens the /System Learning/Resource/Update/UpdateResourceAttributeValueDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating the value of an existing @ ResAttrValues corresponding to an @{code ResourceAttribute} of an Resource instance.

    • Field Detail

      • selectedResource

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource selectedResource
        An instance of Resource used to store the Resource selected by the user from the user interface.

      • resourceList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Resource> resourceList
        An ArrayList of Resource used to display all the existing Resources stored in the database.

      • resourceAttributeList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute> resourceAttributeList
        An ArrayList of ResourceAttribute used to display all the existing ResourceAttribute(s) stored in the database. These ResourceAttribute(s) are related to a particular Resource instance stored in selectedResource.

      • selectedResourceAttributes

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResourceAttribute selectedResourceAttributes
        An instance of ResourceAttribute used to store the ResourceAttribute selected by the user from the user interface.

      • resourceAttributeValueList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues> resourceAttributeValueList
        An ArrayList of ResAttrValues used to display all the existing ResAttrValues(s) stored in the database. These ResAttrValues(s) are related to a particular ResourceAttribute instance stored in selectedResourceAttributes.

      • selectedResourceAttributeValue

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ResAttrValues selectedResourceAttributeValue
        An instance of ResAttrValues used to store the ResAttrValues selected by the user from the user interface.
